name: RPG Golf with Vampires
description:
The time has come to bring justice upon those treacherous vampires. Embark on a golf-like journey in this short game with golf controls.



  • Hunt some vampires by controlling your character like a golf-ball. Learn the hard truth about being a vampire slayer.
  • Spend collected money to upgrade your character between levels
  • Custom game mode with two types of levels: maze that needs to be completed and open-world where you can move freely
